short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create stunning image collages and hilarious memes effortlessly. Combine, blend, and edit photos with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Image Collage and Meme Creator

Create and customize collages and memes directly from your browser with intuitive image, video, and text capturing tools

Features

Image Capture: Quickly add images to your collage using the "Add Image" option in the context menu.

Video Screenshot Capture: Capture screenshots from videos to include in your collage directly through "Add Video Screenshot" context menu.

Text Capture: Add any selected text to your collage effortlessly with the "Add Text" option in the context menu.

Page Capture: Incorporate the visible portion of your current tab into your collage with the "Capture Page" context menu option.

Collage Editor: Assemble and refine your collages by selecting 'Build collage' from the context menu.

Editing Tools: Utilize tools to crop, resize, and personalize text in your creations.

Export: Conveniently save your finished collage and also save to Google Photos 



Shortcuts: Customize shortcuts for "Video Screenshot Capture" and "Page Capture" by navigating to chrome://extensions/shortcuts.


Permissions

Storage: Saves settings and buffers data.
Active Tab: Captures images from the active tab.
Context Menus: Integrates with right-click menus for quick actions.
Tabs and Scripting: Allows webpage manipulation for feature functionality.
Identity: Allow Collage to be saved in Google Photos
